text: Dissé-sous-Ballon is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Sarthe department in the west of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the commune of Marolles-les-Braults.Arrêté préfectoral 18 September 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Sarthe
title: Dissé-sous-Ballon
